import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { experienceData } from '../data/experienceData'; const About = () => { const [activeExperience, setActiveExperience] = useState('experience1'); const [activeMobileTab, setActiveMobileTab] = useState('experience1'); const experienceArray = Object.values(experienceData); const experienceKeys = Object.keys(experienceData); return (
{/* Hero Section */}

About Me

Passionate developer creating digital experiences

{/* My Stack Section */}

My Stack

Technologies and tools I use to bring ideas to life

{/* Marquee */}
React Node.js TypeScript Python MongoDB PostgreSQL AWS Docker Kubernetes Figma Tailwind CSS GraphQL Redis Next.js Vue.js Express.js Django Git Jest Webpack
React Node.js TypeScript Python MongoDB PostgreSQL AWS Docker Kubernetes Figma Tailwind CSS GraphQL Redis Next.js Vue.js Express.js Django Git Jest Webpack
{/* My Story Section */}

My Story

My journey into web development began with a simple curiosity about how websites work. What started as a hobby quickly evolved into a passion for creating digital experiences that solve real-world problems.

Over the years, I've had the privilege of working with amazing teams and clients, building everything from simple landing pages to complex enterprise applications. Each project has taught me something new and pushed me to grow as a developer.

I believe in the power of clean code, user-centered design, and continuous learning. When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing knowledge with the developer community.

My goal is to create digital solutions that not only meet technical requirements but also provide exceptional user experiences that make a positive impact on people's lives.

{/* Experience Section */}

My Experience

A timeline of my professional journey and key achievements
